code: import React from'react';import{FunnelChart,Funnel,LabelList,Tooltip}from'recharts';import{data}from'../../data/chartData';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var divStyle={width:"100%",height:"100%"};var chartWrapperStyle={width:"100%",height:"100%",margin:'0 0 0 100px'};var headlineStyle={margin:'10px 150px 0 0'};var pStyle={margin:'10px 150px 0 0',color:"#a84832"};var Chart=function Chart(props){var filteredData=data.filter(function(item){return item.coordinates.find(function(coordinate){return coordinate.lat>props.coordinates.lat-1&&coordinate.lat<props.coordinates.lat+1&&coordinate.lng>props.coordinates.lng-1&&coordinate.lng<props.coordinates.lng+1;});});var valueTotal=filteredData.reduce(function(totalValue,item){return totalValue+(item.name==="Wind m/s"?item.value*0.3:item.name==="Temperature °C"?item.value*2*0.4:item.name==="Garbage reports"?item.value*0.2:item.name==="Humidity %"?item.value/4*0.1:item.value);},0);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:divStyle,children:filteredData.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:chartWrapperStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:pStyle,children:["Possibility of fire ",Math.round(valueTotal),"%"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:headlineStyle,children:"We predict Fire based on these parameters"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FunnelChart,{width:380,height:250,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Funnel,{dataKey:"value",data:filteredData,isAnimationActive:true,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LabelList,{position:"right",fill:"#000",stroke:"none",dataKey:"name"})})]})]}):'No data Found'});};export default Chart;
